document.discussion_title: Anime/Manga - Japan Box Office: "Detective Conan: Pure Black Nightmare" Leads First Half of 2016 | HALLYU JPOP NATION
document.topic_text: ₩3,038,940 Bunka Tsushinsha reported on the top 10 Japanese films of the first half of 2016 (winter 2015 to June 2016). The top-grossing Japanese film during the period was the 20th Detective Conan feature film, Meitantei Conan: Jyunkoku no Nightmare/Detective Conan: Pure Black Nightmare that earned the record-breaking 6.31 billion yen. It also became the most successful film in the 20-year-old anime franchise, surpassing the previous record of 4.48 billion yen marked by the 19th film Sunflowers of Inferno released in April 2015. The 20 Detective Conan films, whose history started with The Time-Bombed Skyscraper in 1997, has earned over 60 billion yen in total at the domestic market. Top 10 Japanese films in the first half of 2016 1. "Detective Conan: Pure Black Nightmare" - 6.31 billion yen 2. "Yo-kai Watch: Enma Daiou to Itsutsu no Monogatari da Nyan!" - 5.53 billion 3. "Nobunaga Concerto" - 4.61 billion 4. "Doraemon: Nobita and the Birth of Japan 2016" - 4.12 billion 5. "Ansatsu Kyoshitsu ~Sotsugyo-hen~ ( Assassination Classroom: Graduation )" - 3.51 billion 6. "orange" - 3.25 billion 7. "Girls und Panzer der Film" - 2.3 billion 8. "Shokubutsu Zukan Unmei no Koi, Hiroimashita" - 2.2 billion 9. "Crayon Shin-chan: Fast Asleep! Dreaming World Big Assault!" - 2.11 billion 10. "64 -Zenpen-" ( 64- First Part- ) - 1.93 billion Top 10 foreign films in the first half of 2016 1. "Star Wars: The Force Awakens" - 11.63 billion yen 2. "Zootopia" - 7.6~7.7 billion 3. "The Martian" - 3.53 billion 4. "Spectre" - 2.95 billion 5. "Captain America: Civil War" - 2.62 billion 6. "Deadpool" - 2.1~2.2 billion 7. "Batman v Superman: Dawn of Justice" - 1.86 billion 8. "The Good Dinosaur" - 1.7 billion 9. "The Revenant" - 1.07 billion 10. "The Peanuts Movie" - 840 million
